data.eml:eml: Two new species of Gaeolaelaps Evans & Till (Acari: Laelapidae) from Sri Lanka

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Joharchi, Omid, Khaustov, Alexander A., Ermilov, Sergey G. (2019): Two new species of Gaeolaelaps Evans & Till (Acari: Laelapidae) from Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4615 (3): 563-576, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.3.9
